channel.title: Rhizome on jzhao.xyz
channel.description: Recent content in Rhizome on jzhao.xyz

item.title: Rhizome Philosophy
item.description: See the main [[thoughts/Rhizome Proposal|Rhizome Proposal]] Interoperable Data on the web today is mostly treated as second-class to applications. In this form, data is contextual – it only makes sense in the context of what you can do in an application.

item.title: Rhizome Research Log
item.description: I think research logs tend to generally focus too much on what one did rather than what one felt. This log aspired to have a healthy mix of both.

item.title: Rhizome Specification
item.description: See also: [[thoughts/Rhizome Research Log|Research Log]] … tbd scraping the page for now as my idea for what Rhizome even is is still evolving rapidly

item.title: Rhizome Proposal
item.description: Companies of the future should derive value from the intelligence they provide on top of existing data rather than have the value be just the data.
